PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02982018-03-19PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of SALIMA EBRAHIM of Edmonton, Alberta, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Frances Ann Swyripa, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
